data.comment: The first-half is under way at Regenboogstadion - Zulte kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Zulte have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Olivier Deschacht.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Waregem.
The second-half is underway. Genk with the kick-off.
Laurens De Bock (Zulte) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, Saido Berahino is booked for the home team.
Paul Onuachu is replacing Mats Moller Daehli for the away team.
The away team have replaced Benjamin Nygren with Kouassi Eboue. This is the second substitution made today by Hannes Wolf.
In the minute 67, Daniel Opare (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
The home team replace Bassem Srarfi with Mikael Soisalo.
Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a second substitution, with Jean-Luc Dompe replacing Daniel Opare.
In the minute 73, Goal! Genk go level at 1-1 through Paul Onuachu in Waregem.
Genk make their third substitution with Luca Oyen replacing Dries Wouters.
In the minute 79, Genk have been given a penalty...
Cyriel Dessers converts the penalty to give Genk a 1-2 lead.
Francky Dury is making the team's third substitution at Regenboogstadion with Idrissa Sylla replacing Abdoulaye Sissako.
The match has come to a close in Waregem. The final score is 1-2.
Paul Onuachu (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
